event_summary: Wellness and meditation retreat combining traditional Thai healing practices with modern mental health approaches.
commentary_summary: Wellness experts commended the holistic approach and measurable positive outcomes for participants' mental and physical health.
next_event_plan: Develop online wellness programs and create certified Thai healing practitioner training course
event_highlight: Clinical study showing 75% reduction in stress levels among participants after 7-day program
event_object: To promote mental wellness through integration of ancient Thai practices and contemporary therapeutic methods
event_conclusion: Conducted 500 individual sessions, trained 100 new practitioners, and published wellness guidebook
event_conclusion_overall: Transformative retreat that demonstrated effectiveness of combining traditional and modern wellness approaches
next_event_suggestion: Add corporate wellness packages and create mobile wellness app with guided sessions
